subject: Mental Health
title: Chronic Illness and Depression
description: A short lesson to help you apply Chronic Illness and Depression.

hook.text: People with chronic pain are three times more likely to develop depression.

buildup.text: Diseases like diabetes, cancer, and heart failure drain energy and limit life.

discovery.text: Inflammation from chronic illness directly affects the same brain circuits as depression.

twist.text: Depression then worsens the physical illness, creating a vicious downward spiral.

climax.text: Treating depression in these patients improves physical health outcomes too.

punchline.text: The body and mind are sick together or well together.

quiz.question: How does chronic illness relate to depression?
options: Inflammation affects the same brain circuits
